column3: {{c1::c-x x}} - move {{c2::between}} previous and current cursor position.
{{c1::c-g}} - {{c2::aborts}} the current editing command and ring the terminal bell.
{{c1::c-x c-e}} - {{c2::invoke}} text editor on current command line then execute.
{{c1::c-k}} - deletes from cursor to the {{c2::end}} of the line.
{{c1::c-u}} - deletes from cursor to the {{c2::start}} of the line.
